DOC.brief_summary: To compare safety , tolerability efficacy Seroquel risperidone first episode schizophrenia
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Seroquel First Episode Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Age 1835 year Meet ICD10 criterion schizophrenia No abnormaility clinical examination No previous episode psychosis No previous antipsychotic kind last 3 month Have receive course antipsychotic drug treatment prior entry may introduce risk factor interfere study procedure Have receive anticholinergic within 10 day baseline aseessment Have receive mood stabilizer anti depressant within 2 week
